channel.title: Where are my passwords stored in firefox (the file)
channel.description: wheres the file at in firefox where all of my passwords that i hit remember are stored and so can view them what is the file name/file location

If you’re on Linux (which you should be :P) in the kdewallet.

item.title: Where are my passwords stored in firefox (the file)
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

No, you’ve got it all wrong. When you hit “remember” on firefox, It stores the information so it remembers what you type, and has a drop list / automatically fills in the password you saved.
Anyways, I use opera now, haven’t used firefox since I switched over, so if i’m wrong, don’t shoot me.

Read full topic
